snippet: A former Army secretary writes, “To be willing to die for your country in battle is one thing; to be permanently scarred for the sake of tradition is another.”
lead_paragraph: A former Army secretary writes, “To be willing to die for your country in battle is one thing; to be permanently scarred for the sake of tradition is another.”

headline.print_headline: End Boxing at West Pt., a Former Army Secretary Says
headline.main: End Boxing at West Point, a Former Army Secretary Says
